review:
Very friendly doctor. Have been visiting him since my kid was born (past 6 years). Doesnt give any extra dose medicine , looks out for natural remedies instead of giving unnecessary medicines list.

Had a good experience with him always. Would always recommend him to any pediatric related.
Doctor is really very friendly and explain the issues very clearly and has patience . Great experience with doctor anand
